mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t3_tbl_used_purchase ORDER BY USED_P_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t3_tbl_used_purchase(USER_NO, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, USED_P_NAME, USED_P_PRICE, USED_P_SELL_PRICE, MANUFACTURER, USEDTIME, GRADE, CONTENT) VALUES(#{userNo}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{usedName}, #{usedPrice}, #{usedSellPrice}, #{manufacturer}, #{usedtime}, #{grade}, #{content})
INSERT INTO t3_tbl_used_purchase_image(USED_P_NO, P_IMG_ORG_NAME, P_IMG_NAME, P_IMG_PATH, P_IMG_SIZE) VALUES(#{usedPNo}, #{pImgOrgName}, #{pImgName}, #{pImgPath}, #{pImgSize})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t3_tbl_used_purchase P LEFT JOIN t3_tbl_used_purchase_image I ON P.USED_P_NO = I.USED_P_NO WHERE P.USED_P_NO = #{usedPNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE t3_tbl_used_answer SET A_CONTENT = #{aContent}, USED_A_UDATETIME = NOW() WHERE USED_P_NO = #{usedPNo}
